document.full_text: the knicks played the boston celtics, the defending eastern conference champions, to the final seconds, losing only when ray allen struck from the arc.
document.title: celtics 87, knicks 85: knicks battle shot for shot, but celtics make the last one
lines_and_colors: the knicks played the boston celtics, the defending eastern conference champions, to the final seconds, losing only when ray allen struck from the arc.
